The key is to stay ahead of the game. Tax laws are constantly evolving, so you have to be nimble, resourceful, and always one step ahead of the taxman. 

Remember, I'm not breaking any laws. I'm simply using the system to my clients' advantage. It's a game, and I'm damn good at it.
